title: Content-Conditioned Generation of Stylized Free hand Sketches. (arXiv:2401.04739v1 [cs.CV])
abstract: In recent years, the recognition of free-hand sketches has remained a popular task. However, in some special fields such as the military field, free-hand sketches are difficult to sample on a large scale. Common data augmentation and image generation techniques are difficult to produce images with various free-hand sketching styles. Therefore, the recognition and segmentation tasks in related fields are limited. In this paper, we propose a novel adversarial generative network that can accurately generate realistic free-hand sketches with various styles. We explore the performance of the model, including using styles randomly sampled from a prior normal distribution to generate images with various free-hand sketching styles, disentangling the painters' styles from known free-hand sketches to generate images with specific styles, and generating images of unknown classes that are not in the training set. translated_title: 根据内容生成风格化自由手绘草图
translated_abstract: 最近几年，自由手绘草图的识别一直是一个热门任务。然而，在一些特殊领域如军事领域，很难大规模采样自由手绘草图。常见的数据增强和图像生成技术很难产生具有各种自由手绘风格的图像。因此，相关领域中的识别和分割任务受到限制。在本文中，我们提出了一种新的对抗生成网络，可以准确地生成具有各种风格的逼真自由手绘草图。我们探索了模型的性能，包括使用从先验正态分布中随机采样的风格来生成具有各种自由手绘风格的图像，从已知的自由手绘草图中解开画家的风格，以生成具有特定风格的图像，以及生成不在训练集中的未知类别的图像。我们进一步通过定性和定量评估证明我们的优势。
tldr: 本文提出了一种根据内容生成风格化自由手绘草图的新方法，该方法能够准确生成具有各种风格的逼真自由手绘草图。通过在生成过程中使用先验正态分布中随机采样的风格或从已知草图中解开画家风格，该方法能够生成具有特定风格的图像，同时还能生成未知类别的图像。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a novel method for content-conditioned generation of stylized free hand sketches, which can accurately generate realistic sketches with various styles. The method can generate images with specific styles by using randomly sampled styles from a prior normal distribution or by disentangling the painters' styles from known sketches, and it can also generate images of unknown classes.
